title.narrative: 5.2 EARLY LEARNING

description.narrative: 5.2 Improved accessibility and quality of care and pre-primary education for young boys and girls in target districts, by the end of December 2019, with a focus on vulnerable groups., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Early Childhood Development, Early Childhood Development, Early Learning, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 5.0 Improved learning outcomes and equitable and inclusive education for all boys and girls by 2018

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 5.2 Improved accessibility and quality of care and pre-primary education for young boys and girls in target districts, by the endof December 2019, with a focus on vulnerable groups.

description.narrative: Significant progress was made towards improved access and quality of pre-primary education with the finalization of the National Early Childhood Development (ECD) policy for Cabinet approval. Provisions of the policy, Early Childhood Care Education curriculum and minimum standards were included in the “Learning Through Play” curriculum to strengthen quality implementation. This was improved through training of 1,560 ECD educators and facilitators in play-based early learning. A total of 3,605 children (51 per cent girls) enrolled in community-based ECD centers and 88,855 children (54 percent girls) received appropriate teaching, learning and play resources reaching) in 1,225 centers (97 per cent formal). | Status:Met | As-of Date:05/02/2020
